mapper.select: SELECT T_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_IDX , T_SUBJECT.COLLEGE_IDX , T_SUBJECT.DEPARTMENT_IDX , T_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_NAME , T_SUBJECT.USE_YN , T_SUBJECT.DELETE_YN , T_SUBJECT.CREATE_USER_IDX , T_SUBJECT.UPDATE_USER_IDX , T_SUBJECT.DELETE_USER_IDX , T_SUBJECT.UPDATE_DATETIME , T_SUBJECT.CREATE_DATETIME , T_SUBJECT.DELETE_DATETIME , T_USER_CREATE.USER_NAME AS CREATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_UPDATE.USER_NAME AS UPDATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_DELETE.USER_NAME AS DELETE_USER_NAME , T_COLLEGE.COLLEGE_NAME , T_DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM TB_SUBJECT AS T_SUBJECT LEFT JOIN TB_COLLEGE AS T_COLLEGE ON T_COLLEGE.COLLEGE_IDX = T_SUBJECT.COLLEGE_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT AS T_DEPARTMENT ON T_DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENT_IDX = T_SUBJECT.DEPARTMENT_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_CREATE ON T_USER_CREATE.USER_IDX = T_SUBJECT.CREATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_UPDATE ON T_USER_UPDATE.USER_IDX = T_SUBJECT.UPDATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_DELETE ON T_USER_DELETE.USER_IDX = T_SUBJECT.DELETE_USER_IDX WHERE T_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_IDX = #{subjectIdx} LIMIT 1
